title: Number of missing persons files in the U.S. by race 2019
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Race, and Number of missing persons in each Race on the y axis.
The Number of missing persons is appeared to be the highest at Race White and lowest at Race Indian.
The highest value at Race White is 34.44x times more than the lowest value at Indian.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Race in the x axis and Number of missing persons in the y axis.
Race White has the highest Number of missing persons and Indian has the lowest Number of missing persons.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Race, and Number of missing persons in each Race on the y axis.
The Number of missing persons is appeared to be the highest at Race White and lowest at Race Indian.
The highest value at Race White is 34.44x times more than the lowest value at Indian.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Race in the x axis and Number of missing persons in the y axis.
The Number of missing persons is highest at Race White and lowest at Race Indian.
The second highest Number of missing persons is appeared to be the Race Black.
Race White has 34.44 times more Number of missing persons than Race Indian which is has the lowest.
Number of missing persons at Race White is 359768.0 , second place is Black at 205802.0, and thirdly is Unknown at 20587.0.
The highest value 359768.0 at White is almost 2.95 times larger than the average value 121855.0.
